text: <!channel> could I get some design direction on the keyboard UI?
yeah, of course. in what regards, <@U026PT0D7>?
button shape, total keyboard size, maybe a :thumbsup: / :thumbsdown: on the keys layout
also colors, typefaces
<@U0265G76F>: <@U0260V4K1> <@U026E0ZNR> any thoughts
I think this is probably a question for <@U026E0ZNR> or <@U0265G76F> - but for my part, it's such a small part of the overall experience, I'm wary of going down any road that adds complexity
We didn't have it on Meijer but I really want to add '@' and '.com' buttons
<@U026AP8CM>
I also don't know if we have budget for more design
yes - I totally agree with <@U0289USNA>
<@U0260V4K1>:  we don't. so i would say if there's an issue w/ the keyboard, let's chat, otherwise, the fact we have one is a success.
I'd rather have that than an updated visual
yeah - agreed
yeah, I agree with Scott about the @ and .com buttons
if we can add those buttons, I'm happy
i don't see any reason why I won't be able to add them
<@U026PT0D7>: how long does it take?
probably just a few minutes. I just need to track down the right place in the code to add the buttons
sorry - was away from machine
agree we don't need to alter design
does the form field ever get obscured by keyboard? That'd be my only real experience consideration
but agreed with all other considerations — add the @ and .com
no, but I can add a little motion to this too--push the form up a little when the keyboard presents
cool. I think it's only needed if the field goes under keyboard
making sure people can see what they're typing
i agree - let's just add that if we absolutely need it. buttons for sure.
ok. thanks!
thanks spencer!
Just saw this... but it looks like you guys have it all covered. Sounds good to me!
I think this looks nice.
looks nice.
